title: A Modular PC Case That's Done RIGHT!
description: The Lian Li Odyssey X  is one of the best, most unique PC cases we've seen in a long time.  While it focuses on water cooling enthusiasts, its modular interior and exterior should appeal to anyone.  They were also showing the Lancool 2 which is looking like one of the best affordable cases around.    A special thanks to Phanteks and Steelseries for making Computex 2019 possible.  Lian Li is also a minor sponsor who supported some meals and transport.     Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Steelseries, Phanteks and Lian Li. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #modularpccase #lianli #computex2019 #hardwarecanucks
